plot: Roschelle learns from a friend the joys of cheating on one's husband. Roschelle also has a buxom friend Janette, who leaves her own lover to help Roschelle seduce a door-to-door missionary out of his naiveté.
title: Midslumber's Night Dream
plot_es: Roschelle learns from a friend the joys of cheating on one's husband. Roschelle also has a buxom friend Janette, who leaves her own lover to help Roschelle seduce a door-to-door missionary out of his naiveté.
plot_en: Roschelle learns from a friend the joys of cheating on one's husband. Roschelle also has a buxom friend Janette, who leaves her own lover to help Roschelle seduce a door-to-door missionary out of his naiveté.
